title: Character Actions - Audio Pack
description: High quality character actions audio pack for your game!
longDescription:
Hello!


In this pack, I create a lot of sounds that a character can do, like walk, jump, slide, scream, attack, etc. You'll have 42 different types of sounds, and each one of them has at least 3 variations, so you'll get 166 .wav files in all the pack :D


Here's the list:


  • footstep_barefoot_metal_v1
  • footstep_barefoot_metal_v2
  • footstep_barefoot_metal_v3
  • footstep_barefoot_metal_v4
  • footstep_barefoot_metal_v5
  • footstep_dirt_v1
  • footstep_dirt_v2
  • footstep_dirt_v3
  • footstep_grass_v1
  • footstep_grass_v2
  • footstep_grass_v3
  • footstep_snow_v1
  • footstep_snow_v2
  • footstep_snow_v3
  • footstep_water_v1
  • footstep_water_v2
  • footstep_water_v3
  • footstep_wood_v1
  • footstep_wood_v2
  • footstep_wood_v3
  • jump_v1
  • jump_v2
  • jump_v3
  • jump_v4
  • jump_v5
  • scream_attack_v1
  • scream_attack_v2
  • shout_v1
  • shout_v2
  • slide_dirt_v1
  • slide_dirt_v2
  • slide_grass_v1
  • slide_grass_v2
  • slide_metal_v1
  • slide_metal_v2
  • slide_snow_v1
  • slide_snow_v2
  • slide_v1
  • slide_v2
  • slide_v3
  • slide_water_v1
  • slide_water_v2




CHECK THE PREVIEW

CHECK THE DOCUMENTATION


Two good news:


1 - You're not paying for the variations :D

2 - This pack will receive updates!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 166

Number of Audio Cues: 166

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) No

Documentation: Here

Important/Additional Notes: The background abstract image used on the cover and video is free distributed for commercial use by unsplash
